snippet: WADA’s director general endorsed the laboratory, which had been expected to handle testing at the Olympics before being suspended last month....
abstract: World Anti-Doping Agency clears Rio de Janeiro drug testing laboratory in time for 2016 Olympics, following brief suspension.
lead_paragraph: WADA’s director general endorsed the laboratory, which had been expected to handle testing at the Olympics before being suspended last month.

headline.main: WADA Clears Rio Drug-Testing Laboratory After Brief Suspension
headline.print_headline: Lab Can Handle Testing in Rio, WADA Says
